API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.core.Renderer

type
class
version
3.1
This class is design to handle the rendering processing of a Sandy3D scene. Basically, it collects elemens to render, prepare their matrix, project vertices. It also manage the cache system. It means it handle the fact that any non moving object isn't rendered.

Constructor

new()
Default renderer.

Instance Variables

addToDisplayList(default,method) : p_oObject : sandy.core.scenegraph.IDisplayable -> Void

init(default,method) : Void -> Void

Init the renderer internal data

removeFromDisplayList(default,method) : p_oObject : sandy.core.scenegraph.IDisplayable -> Void

render(default,method) : p_oScene : Scene3D -> ?p_bUseCache : Bool -> Bool

Render the given scene. Objects are transformed, clipped and projected into that function.

renderDisplayList(default,method) : p_oScene : Scene3D -> Void

Process the rendering of the scene. The camera has all the information needed about the objects to render. The camera stores all the visible shape/polygons into an array, and loop through it calling their display method. Before the display call, the container graphics is cleared.
